<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete an invocation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/invocations/{invocation_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Use kill_invocation/cancel_invocation/purge_invocation instead.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"invocation_id","in":"path","description":"Invocation identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"mode","in":"query","description":"If cancel, it will gracefully terminate the invocation. If kill, it will terminate the invocation with a hard stop. If purge, it will only cleanup the response for completed invocations, and leave unaffected an in-flight invocation.","style":"simple","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["Cancel","Kill","Purge"],"title":"DeletionMode"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
